general.name: General
general.description: A military leader skilled in combat and warfare. Best for building armies and conquering territory.
general.flavor_text: You begin your conquest with martial training and heavy armor. Your sword arm is strong and your tactics sound.

mage.name: Mage
mage.description: A wielder of arcane powers. Masters one elemental school of magic. Best for magical dominance and enchantments.
mage.flavor_text: You begin your journey with mystical knowledge and the power to bend reality. Magic flows through your veins.

adventurer.name: Adventurer
adventurer.description: An explorer skilled in scouting and survival. Best for discovering new lands and navigating difficult terrain.
adventurer.flavor_text: You begin as a wanderer with keen eyes and survival instincts. The wild holds no secrets from you.

craftsman.name: Craftsman
craftsman.description: A skilled artisan with knowledge of two crafts. Best for economic development and production.
craftsman.flavor_text: You begin with skilled hands and knowledge of craft. You can build an empire from raw materials.
